meanings.definition: A group of seven days; a week.
meanings.sent1: Every hebdomads, we have a family movie night on Saturday.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to the weekend, which marks the end of the hebdomads.
meanings.sent3: During the hebdomads, my cat seems to know when it's Sunday and demands extra cuddles.
meanings.sent4: The hebdomads pass by like a gentle breeze, each day distinct yet connected.
meanings.sent5: In the hebdomads, Monday feels like a fresh start, while Friday brings a sense of accomplishment.

meanings.sent1: The ancient civilization predicted prosperity every seven hebdomads.
meanings.sent2: She had been working at the company for two hebdomads before getting promoted.
meanings.sent3: In seven hebdomads, the tree in our backyard grew taller than our house!
meanings.sent4: The journey of life can be divided into different hebdomads, each marking a significant phase.
meanings.sent5: After seven hebdomads of hard work, he finally achieved his dream of owning a small business.
